text: 1. 'And he who offers the fourth oblation, should offer it to Samâna (on-breathing), saying Svâhâ. Then Samâna is satisfied,

text: 2. 'If Samâna is satisfied, the mind is satisfied, if the mind is satisfied, Par g anya (god of rain) is satisfied, if Par g anya is satisfied, lightning is satisfied, if lightning is satisfied, whatever is under Par g anya and under lightning is satisfied. And through their
